name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack engineering, specializing in **Ruby on Rails**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and modern **TypeScript** frameworks such as **Stimulus**, **Turbo**, and **Tailwind CSS**. Proven track record in building scalable applications and optimizing site performance with a focus on automated and unit testing methodologies. Experienced with **AWS**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** for infrastructure management and deployment. In-depth knowledge of **JSON:API** and **GraphQL** for efficient data handling. 

I possess strong leadership skills, providing mentorship to junior developers while fostering effective communication and teamwork across cross-functional teams. My background includes developing robust solutions in high-compliance environments, ensuring applications are designed to meet rigorous standards. Leveraging expertise in **Git** and **GitHub**, I contribute to collaborative project development, enhancing code quality and maintainability.
